name: Jack Ferguson and The Cursed Pyramid
name_original: Jack Ferguson and The Cursed Pyramid
description:
Remake of my first published game, The Forbidden Pyramid. I improved the graphics,  added new traps and enemies, changed some of the rooms, and controls become much better.

Jack Ferguson and The Cursed Pyramid is a retro sytle platformer, where you have to collect ancient relics then escape from a pyramid. For the graphics i used pixel art and the NES color palette.

- 16 rooms to explore
- 1 secret room
- 11 different traps and enemies
- 5 difficulty settings
- circa 15-20 minutes of gameplay

If you played the game please leave a comment, i really appreciate it!
